name: Sunny the Space Snowball
description:
My solo entry to Unreal's 2020 Spring Game Jam!

Gameplay Video

Team Name: SebDevs

Team Member: Sebastian Serrano

Game Name: Sunny The Space Snowball

Assets: 100% Original Content (except for my cat's meow)

Oh no! Space Pawfficer Sunny has crashlanded! His three Space Fuel Pellets are lost somewhere in the Snow... Will you help him Thaw his way out of this cold rock and purr his way home?

A physics-based sidescrolling platformer where you must use your Jetpack to navigate and Thaw the Snow in search for your hidden Fuel! Remember that Thawing the snow is permanent! 

CONTROLS

[A] , [D] to Float sideways.

[SPACEBAR] To fire your Jetpack (hold for more thrust and chain them for moar air!)

[SHIFT] + [A] , [D] to Boost sideways.

[ENTER] Restart Mission

[ESCAPE] Exit Game
